info.name: Space Code Platform
info.description:
application to manage the transport fleet of goods through the galaxy, including planets.

this application manage information about the pilots, ships, contracts as well as the cargos they transport.

it is also possible generate reports about total weight in tons of each resource sent and received by each planet, percentage of resource type transported by each pilot and Intergalactic Federation transactions ledger sorted by date (oldest to newest).
